# Islamic Revolutionary State of Afghanistan

}}
The Islamic Revolutionary State of Afghanistan (), also known as the Islamic Revolutionary State of Nuristan, () was a small Salafist Islamic state located in the north of Bashgal Valley, Nuristan Province. It was founded by Mawlawi Afzal during the nationwide Afghan mujahideen insurgency against the Soviet-backed Democratic Republic of Afghanistan and established consulates in Saudi Arabia and Pakistan. The state was absorbed by the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan after Mawlawi Afzal allied with the Taliban.
